page.title: 13HOUSING:CALLANDER/KILMAHOG
page.content: Houses in the area of Ancaster Road were built from the beginning of the century. At the west of the town are some large {Victorian villas.}In Victorian days rich people would come from the cities to renew their health,staying in these villas for the summer. Nearby at Tulipan,an estate of{timber {framed houses}has been built. Leaving Callander going west to Kilmahog there is a cluster of older houses,each standing in its own ground.These are over 200 years old. Most of the houses in this area are owener occupied.
